text: Wita ða þe nu beoð & ða te cumene sy þat yc Osbern Execestres biscop gef leaua ðam munche on Sancte Nicholaus minstre to hringinde hyre tyde be dage & be nihte, hwanne hy efre willat swa swa belympð to hire andebernisse, bute an Cristes masseniht, & giester sunneue, & Sancte Petres and Paules massedeg.

And þeos leaua þurh hyre abbed Henri, & toforan him & his munchun & toforan eallum mynum canunche innan minum capitule of myne & hyre eallre helf swa fastlice ys ysett, þat non man after þys ðas ysettinge undon ne mage.
And for þyse leaua, twygys elce gere þat is an Palmsunnendeg, & Cristes upstigan deg, to processiun mid þam canunche hy gan sceule.
